A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A lot has been said. This is not the movie anyone was waiting for. It has taken Star Wars into the wrong direction. It fails as a film\, a sequel\, and as part of the Star Wars universe. It may be successful as a marketing exercising relaunch of the franchise but it will not be the franchise Disney bought. Nor have the longevity they bought in. The demographics will not be there in time. As it is it may be that most of the loyal fans will reconsider their alliance to the franchise as it stands.
